links.title: Tesla Wins Massive Contract to Power the California Grid
links.description: Tesla just won a bid to supply grid-scale power in Southern California to help prevent electricity shortages following the biggest natural gas leak in U.S. history. The Powerpacks, worth tens of millions of dollars, will be operational in record time-by the end of this year. Tesla Motors Inc.

links.title: Will Electric Vehicles Kill Oil Demand?
links.description: When Tesla accepted reservations for its new Model 3, which has a starting price of USD 35,000, the car maker was swamped by people eager to put down USD 1,000 as a deposit. Within just a few weeks, 400,000 enthusiasts had ordered a car they hadn't even seen in the flesh, let alone driven.

message.body: $TSLA , $MBLY Accelerate Public Spat Over Autopilot https://goo.gl/py0twQ

links.title: Tesla Motors Inc, Mobileye Accelerate Public Spat Over Autopilot
links.description: In July, Tesla Motors Inc. ( NASDAQ:TSLA) saw a major breakup with its technology supplier Mobileye NV that it had been working with, for long three years. The Israel-based driverless car software provider makes camera sensors and other software; it had been supplying the auto giant with technology for its semi-autonomous Autopilot feature used in Model X and Model S electric vehicles (EV).

links.title: Tesla is still going to win the driverless-car race
links.description: Tesla is entering one of the roughest periods it has ever faced. In the fourth quarter, the electric-car maker must deliver at least 80,000 vehicles to meet its guidance, continue to develop the Model 3 mass-market sedan for a 2017 launch, and grow its energy-storage business.

messages.body: $TSLA who is perfectly positioned to become a trillion dollar company by 2026? http://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2016-06-13/we-ve-almost-reached-peak-fossil-fuels-for-electricity

links.title: The World Nears Peak Fossil Fuels for Electricity
links.description: The way we get electricity is about to change dramatically, as the era of ever-expanding demand for fossil fuels comes to an end-in less than a decade. That's according to a new forecast by Bloomberg New Energy Finance that plots out global power markets for the next 25 years.

links.title: Tesla lands battery storage contract with SoCal Edison
links.description: Tesla has found a big, wealthy customer for its batteries - Southern California Edison. The Palo Alto tech company won a bid to provide the Southern California utility a storage system for its Mira Loma substation. The company announced the deal Thursday, saying it would be the largest lithium-ion storage system in the world when it's complete.

Michigan State Officials Rejects $TSLA Request for Dealership License https://goo.gl/VhGdDm

links.title: Michigan State Officials Rejects Tesla Motors Inc. (TSLA) Request for Dealership License
links.description: State officials in Michigan have denied Tesla Motors Inc.'s ( NASDAQ:TSLA) request to introduce a company-owned dealership, allowing the company to have dealership license to sell its all-electric cars in the region. This move shows the home state for General Motors Co and Ford Motor Co, will stick to its sanction on selling new vehicles directly to customers.

links.title: Tesla Motors Inc Announces Installation of Biggest Global Lithium Ion Power Storage
links.description: Published By: Angela Campbell on September 17, 2016 08:35 am EST Tesla Motors Inc. ( NASDAQ:TSLA) shares have risen 2.48% in the market due to recent optimism surrounding the stock. However, the shares plunged 14.42% year-to-date through Friday, which comes as a surprise due to the positive news regarding the automaker surfacing the market.
